name: ChainlinkProxyPriceProvider
description: ChainlinkProxyPriceProvider. Proxy smart contract to get the price of an asset from a price source, with Chainlink Aggregator smart contracts as primary option - If the returned price by a Chainlink aggregator is <= 0, the call is forwarded to a fallbackOracle - Owned by the Multiplier governance system, allowed to add sources for assets, replace them and change the fallbackOracle.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets an asset price by address.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetsPrices
functionDecorators.description: Gets a list of prices from a list of assets addresses.

functionDecorators.name: getFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the fallback oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getSourceOfAsset
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the source for an asset address.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetSources
functionDecorators.description: External function called by the Multiplier governance to set or replace sources of assets.

parameterDecorators.name: _sources
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the source of each asset.

functionDecorators.name: setFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the fallbackOracle - Callable only by the Multiplier governance.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
